title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements, and create a detailed project plan including security considerations, file transfer protocols, malware detection mechanisms, and integration with existing systems.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flow, security considerations, and scalability. The architecture should include the following components: a front-end interface for users to upload/download files, a back-end server to handle file transfers, a malware detection engine, a database to store file metadata and user information, and a secure storage system for files. Consider using microservices architecture for better scalability and maintainability. Ensure proper authentication, authorization, and encryption mechanisms are in place for secure file transfers. Address potential performance bottlenecks and provide recommendations for load balancing and caching strategies.

title: Security Architecture and Threat Modeling
description: Design the security architecture and perform threat modeling to identify potential vulnerabilities. The security architecture should cover encryption, authentication, access control, and secure communication protocols. Threat modeling should consider various attack vectors, such as man-in-the-middle attacks, brute-force attacks, and malware injection.

title: File Transfer Protocol Implementation
description: Implement secure file transfer protocols (SFTP, FTP, FTPS) for file sharing.

title: Malware Detection and Scanning
description: Integrate malware detection and scanning mechanisms to identify potential threats.

title: User Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms for secure access control.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the file sharing application.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, file metadata, and other relevant information.

title: Continuous Integration and Deployment Setup
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Documentation and User Guide
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the application.
